remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures or navigation is not dependent upon its use.

numlitem.para: RNP-5 (BRNAV) airspace – All GPS may be inoperative provided the flight is limited to 2 hours after the last DME/DME or VOR/DME update.
RNP-10 Airspace – All GPS may be inoperative provided the flight is limited to 12 hours after the last DME/DME or VOR/DME update.
Flight Control to ensure ADS-B Out is not required along planned route. (e.g. Hudson Bay, etc.). Reference IOM Communications Section for Limitations and Procedures.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "BOTH GPS(s) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
